meaning_str.bing:
adv. 尤其；特别；专门；非常
网络. 格外；特别是；尤其是

特别地；尤其；非常；格外；专门地；显著地；特有地；特定地；在很大程度上

1.en: must give the child the morning to cook, let the children eat rice, not allowed to eat snacks, especially those unhealthy foods.
1.cn: 早晨一定要给孩子做饭，让孩子吃好饭，不许吃零食，尤其是那些不卫生的食品。

2.en: One of his suggestions seems easy to follow and especially useful: Arrive early.
2.cn: 他有一条建议非常简单并且也极其有用：早到。

3.en: The wood of any of these trees, especially the hard, close-grained wood of the sugar maple , often used for furniture and flooring.
3.cn: 槭树材这些树木的任一种木材，尤指坚硬、木纹细密的糖槭木材，通常用于做家具和地板。

0.en: And I especially wanna thank my wife.
0.cn: 我尤其想感谢我的妻子。

1.en: Temple Fairs became especially popular during the Qing Dynasty.

2.en: Everyone loves playing football, especially when it's muddy.
2.cn: 大家都喜欢踢足球，尤其是当地上有泥的时候。

3.en: I love fire engines, especially when they make muddy puddles.
3.cn: 我非常喜欢消防车，尤其是它帮我们浇出了泥坑！

4.en: Charming, smart, and very skilled at combat. Especially in water.
4.cn: 他迷人，聪明，战术技巧非常高超，尤其在水中。

6.en: You want to endorse a winner, especially one you appointed to his position.
6.cn: 你想支持一个赢家，尤其是你任命的人。

7.en: I appreciate your coming here in person. Especially during the, final rush.
7.cn: 我感谢你亲自过来，尤其在这最后冲刺阶段。

8.en: Hurray. Everyone loves going on the bus, especially Goldie the fish.
8.cn: 太好啦！大家都喜欢坐公共汽车，尤其是金鱼金金。

9.en: I knew you were a danger to me right from the off. Especially after Halloween.
9.cn: 我一开始就知道你是个威胁，尤其万圣节之后。

10.en: Oh, yeah. Swimmingly. Especially the blue one. He went in his little house.
10.cn: 是啊，如鱼得水，尤其是那条蓝色的，它游进自己的小鱼窝了。

11.en: I want to know what's going on. No one just gets as good as you do. Especially you.
11.cn: 我要知道究竟怎么回事，没有人能进步如此神速尤其是你。

12.en: Especially not some jerk who never had the guts to try to be anything more than a Pawpsicle hustler.
12.cn: 尤其是个没胆量的混球，只知道智取爪子冰棍。

13.en: I'm sure he doesn't mean to come here and make threats. Especially during a Water Truce.
13.cn: 我敢肯定，他到这儿来不是耍威风，尤其是在枯水休战期。

14.en: You should expect an increase in body hair, especially on your face, chest, armpits.
14.cn: 这一时期，身体会出现毛发的增长，尤其在脸部，胸部，腋窝。

15.en: I'm good, Will. And it's always good to see you, especially in such a triumphant state.
15.cn: 我很好，威尔，见到你总是很高兴，尤其是在这胜利的氛围中。

16.en: Yes. Monica, what did you mean before when you said you didn't want to talk to anyone, especially me?
16.cn: 你是什么意思，当你说你不想和任何人谈，尤其是我？

17.en: Well, look at all of you. You're all very deeply beautiful. Especially you, Farkle.
17.cn: 看看，你们所有人，你们内心深处全都那么美，尤其是你，法尔科。

18.en: So your assignment today is to wash a car, together. With him? Especially with him.
18.cn: 所以你们今天的任务是齐心协力洗辆车。跟他一起？尤其要跟他一起。

19.en: Something that a Republican-controlled Congress will never do. Especially in a VA hospital.
19.cn: 如果共和党控制了国会，这就无法实现，尤其是在退伍军人医院。
